Aggregate raster to region of interest

Source: R/traviz-methods.R
aggregate_raster_region.Rd

Aggregate raster to region of interest

aggregate_raster_region(
  raster,
  xmin = NULL,
  xmax = NULL,
  ymin = NULL,
  ymax = NULL
)

Arguments

xmin

min x value
xmax

max x calue
ymin

min y value
ymax

max y value
rasterized

rasterized object

Value

Cropped raster to ROI
